action.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__axisubs_currencies` ( `axisubs_currency_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `currency_title` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `currency_code` varchar(3) NOT NULL, `currency_position` varchar(12) NOT NULL, `currency_symbol` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `currency_num_decimals` int(4) NOT NULL, `currency_decimal` varchar(12) NOT NULL, `currency_thousands` char(1) NOT NULL, `currency_value` float(15,8) NOT NULL, `enabled` int(11) NOT NULL, `ordering` int(11) NOT NULL, `created_on` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `created_by` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `modified_on` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `modified_by` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `locked_on` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `locked_by` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`axisubs_currency_id`), UNIQUE KEY `currency_code` (`currency_code`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__axisubs_customers` ( `axisubs_customer_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `first_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `last_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `email` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `phone` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `company` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `vat_number` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `address1` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `address2` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `city` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `state` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zip` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `country` char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'XX', `auto_collection` int(11) NOT NULL, `allow_direct_debit` int(11) NOT NULL, `created_on` datetime NOT NULL, `created_from_ip` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `params` text NOT NULL, `notes` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`axisubs_customer_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__axisubs_emailtemplatecontents` ( `axisubs_emailtemplatecontent_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `emailtemplate_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `language_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `field` varchar(500) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `content` text, PRIMARY KEY (`axisubs_emailtemplatecontent_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__axisubs_emailtemplates` ( `axisubs_emailtemplate_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `type` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `event` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `recipients` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `cc` varchar(1000) NOT NULL, `bcc` varchar(1000) NOT NULL, `subscription_status` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `paymentmethod` varchar(2005) DEFAULT NULL, `enabled` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `ordering` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `created_on` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `created_by` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `modified_on` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `modified_by` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `locked_on` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `locked_by` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `params` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`axisubs_emailtemplate_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__axisubs_history` ( `axisubs_history_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `entity` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `type` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `message` text NOT NULL, `created_on` datetime NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__axisubs_logs` ( `axisubs_log_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `log_time` datetime NOT NULL, `event` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `message` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`axisubs_log_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__axisubs_plans` ( `axisubs_plan_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `slug` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `image` varchar(1024) NOT NULL, `description` text, `period` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '365', `trial_period` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '365', `trial_start_condition` varchar(15) NOT NULL, `taxprofile_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `charge_model` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `price` float NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `setup_cost` float DEFAULT '0', `ordertext` text, `orderurl` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `canceltext` text, `cancelurl` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `recurring` int(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `forever` int(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `access` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `fixed_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `payment_plugins` varchar(2096) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `renew_url` varchar(2048) DEFAULT '', `content_url` varchar(2048) DEFAULT '', `params` text, `enabled` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `ordering` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL, `created_on` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `created_by` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `modified_on` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `modified_by` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `locked_on` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `locked_by` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`axisubs_plan_id`), UNIQUE KEY `slug` (`slug`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__axisubs_plan_prices` ( `axisubs_plan_price_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `axisubs_plan_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `axisubs_currency_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `price` float NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`axisubs_plan_price_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__axisubs_subscriptioninfos` ( `axisubs_subscriptioninfo_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `subscription_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `billing_first_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `billing_last_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `billing_email` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `billing_phone` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `billing_company` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `vat_number` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `billing_address1` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `billing_address2` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `billing_city` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `billing_state` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `billing_zip` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `billing_country` char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'XX', `created_on` datetime NOT NULL, `created_from_ip` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `params` text NOT NULL, `notes` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`axisubs_subscriptioninfo_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__axisubs_subscriptions` ( `axisubs_subscription_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `plan_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `plan_quantity` int(11) NOT NULL, `status` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `start_date` datetime NOT NULL, `trial_start` datetime NOT NULL, `trial_end` datetime NOT NULL, `current_term_start` datetime NOT NULL, `current_term_end` datetime NOT NULL, `skip_trial` int(11) NOT NULL, `remaining_billing_cycles` int(11) NOT NULL, `po_number` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `started_at` datetime NOT NULL, `activated_at` datetime NOT NULL, `created_on` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `cancel_reason` text NOT NULL, `affiliate_token` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `created_from_ip` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `has_scheduled_changes` int(11) NOT NULL, `due_invoices_count` int(11) NOT NULL, `due_since` datetime NOT NULL, `total_dues` decimal(15,5) NOT NULL, `invoice_notes` text NOT NULL, `ip` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `ip_country` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `currency_code` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `currency_value` float NOT NULL, `language` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `total` float NOT NULL, `subtotal` float NOT NULL, `plan_price` float NOT NULL, `setup_fee` float NOT NULL, `subtotal_ex_tax` float NOT NULL, `tax` float NOT NULL, `shipping` float NOT NULL, `shipping_tax` float NOT NULL, `discount` float NOT NULL, `discount_tax` float NOT NULL, `surcharge` float NOT NULL, `fees` float NOT NULL, `params` text, PRIMARY KEY (`axisubs_subscription_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__axisubs_taxes` ( `axisubs_tax_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `tax_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `tax_type` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `tax_settings` text NOT NULL, `enabled` int(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`axisubs_tax_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__axisubs_taxratelocations` ( `axisubs_taxratelocation_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `location_code` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `tax_rate_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `location_type` varchar(40) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`axisubs_taxratelocation_id`), KEY `tax_rate_id` (`tax_rate_id`), KEY `location_type` (`location_type`), KEY `location_type_code` (`location_type`,`location_code`(90)) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__axisubs_taxrates` ( `axisubs_taxrate_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `tax_rate_country` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `tax_rate_state` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `tax_rate` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `tax_rate_name` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `tax_rate_priority` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `tax_rate_compound` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `tax_rate_shipping` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `tax_rate_order` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `tax_rate_class` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`axisubs_taxrate_id`), KEY `tax_rate_country` (`tax_rate_country`(191)), KEY `tax_rate_state` (`tax_rate_state`(191)), KEY `tax_rate_class` (`tax_rate_class`(191)), KEY `tax_rate_priority` (`tax_rate_priority`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__axisubs_transactions` ( `axisubs_transaction_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `hash` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `subscription_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `transaction_status` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `payment_processor` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `processor_status` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `transaction_ref_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `transaction_amount` float NOT NULL, `transaction_currency` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `prepayment` text NOT NULL, `postpayment` text NOT NULL, `authorize` text NOT NULL, `params` text NOT NULL, `created_on` datetime NOT NULL, `modified_on` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`axisubs_transaction_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=37 ;
